name: Haas Hall Community Council
description: 1. To encourage residents to take full advantage of the intellectual, cultural, social, academic, and recreational experience offered by the University and community. 2. To develop a desirable attitude toward learning and achieve a spirit of fellowship among the residents of Haas Hall. 3. To create an environment which will encourage self-expression within acceptable limits and the expression of residents talents in an original and creative manner. 4. To provide an avenue by which the residents may express ideas, concerns, and opinions to the University. 5. To serve as the general governing body over Haas Hall.
summary: 1. To encourage residents to take full advantage of the intellectual, cultural, social, academic, and recreational experience offered by the University and community. 2. To develop a desirable attitude toward learning and achieve a spirit of fellowship...
